title: 90-Minute Sailing Tour
text:
The Embarcadero at Beach Street San Francisco, CA 94112 
12:00 p.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 Categories 
Events, Outdoors | Recreation, Sports Sailing Tour of San Francisco Bay Aboard a Classic-Style Yacht For a relaxing afternoon on the water, hop aboard the Privateer, a truly traditional sailboat, for a semi-private 90-minute cruise of the bay, complete with included beer and wine. This double-masted, teak-decked, bronze-fitted beauty holds no more than 28 passengers, so you'll get plenty of personal attention from the skilled and friendly crew as the Privateer glides over to Alcatraz and Angel Island, passes by charming and picturesque Sausalito, parallels the magnificent Golden Gate Bridge and sails past the famous San Francisco skyline on its way back to the pier. $27.00
